metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9803 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - negligible.
metadata.Description: In BlueZ 5.42, an out-of-bounds read was observed in "le_meta_ev_dump" function in "tools/parser/hci.c" source file. This issue exists because 'subevent' (which is used to read correct element from 'ev_le_meta_str' array) is overflowed.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2020-02-07, appears unfixed crash in hcidump command line tool only

criterions.comment: bluez package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
